root.name: The Sims 3: Katy Perry Sweet Treats
root.description: OverviewThe Sims 3: Katy Perry Sweet Treats is another in a long line of expansions for The Sims 3. This particular pack adds numerous objects, all inspired by Katy Perry's confectionery theme, such as playground equipment shaped like candy, a guitar shaped like a cupcake and cotton candy trees. This sweet motif extends to the d√©cor choices at large, including wallpaper and flooring based around the candy theme. Sims themselves can also don a number of different outfits inspired by Katy Perry's dress sense, and can be customised with Katy Perry-themed hair and makeup.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows XP, Vista and Windows 7PROCESSOR: Intel Pentium 4 @ 2.0 GHz / AMD Athlon XP 2000+MEMORY: 1 GBVIDEO CARD: nVidia GeForce FX 5900 / ATI Radeon 9500 / 128 MBHDD SPACE: 7 GB
